terms.meaning: Image mein kya object hai identify karna.
terms.example: Photo mein cat ya dog detect karna.

terms.meaning: Image mein multiple objects find karna aur locate karna.
terms.example: Traffic mein cars, pedestrians detect karna.

terms.meaning: Image ke har pixel ko classify karna.
terms.example: Medical scan mein organs ko segment karna.

terms.meaning: Person ki identity face se identify karna.
terms.example: Phone unlock karne ke liye face recognition.

terms.meaning: Optical Character Recognition, text images se extract karna.
terms.example: Document scan kar ke text nikalna.

terms.meaning: Images ko model ke liye ready karna.
terms.example: Resize, normalize, augment karna.

terms.meaning: Existing images modify kar ke more training data banana.
terms.example: Images rotate, flip, crop karna.

terms.meaning: Images se important characteristics nikalna.
terms.example: Edges, corners, textures detect karna.

terms.meaning: You Only Look Once, real-time object detection algorithm.
terms.example: Video mein real-time objects detect karna.

terms.meaning: Region-based CNN for object detection.
terms.example: Image mein regions propose kar ke objects detect karna.

terms.meaning: Residual Network, very deep networks train karne ke liye.
terms.example: 150+ layers ka network without vanishing gradient.

terms.meaning: Visual Geometry Group network architecture.
terms.example: Image classification ke liye popular CNN architecture.

terms.meaning: Deep learning revolution start karne wala CNN.
terms.example: 2012 mein ImageNet competition win kiya.

terms.meaning: Feature maps ka size reduce karna.
terms.example: Max pooling, average pooling operations.

terms.meaning: Filters apply kar ke features extract karna.
terms.example: Edge detection filters image pe apply karna.

terms.meaning: Convolution operation mein use hone wala filter.
terms.example: 3x3 kernel for edge detection.

terms.meaning: Convolution filter kitne steps mein move kare.
terms.example: Stride 2 means filter 2 pixels jump kare.

terms.meaning: Image borders pe extra pixels add karna.
terms.example: Same padding output size maintain karta hai.

terms.meaning: Convolution operation ka output.
terms.example: Each filter ek feature map produce karta hai.

terms.meaning: Input image ka area jo ek neuron affect karta hai.
terms.example: Deep layers mein large receptive field hota hai.

terms.meaning: Text ko words ya subwords mein divide karna.
terms.example: Sentence ko individual words mein split karna.

terms.meaning: Words ko unke root form mein convert karna.
terms.example: Running, runs ko run mein convert karna.

terms.meaning: Words ko unke base dictionary form mein convert karna.
terms.example: Better ko good mein convert karna.

terms.meaning: Common words jo analysis mein useful nahi hote.
terms.example: The, is, at, which jaise words.

terms.meaning: N consecutive words ka sequence.
terms.example: Bigram means 2 words together like 'machine learning'.

terms.meaning: Term Frequency-Inverse Document Frequency, word importance measure.
terms.example: Rare words ko high score, common words ko low score.

terms.meaning: Words ko numerical vectors mein represent karna.
terms.example: Word2Vec, GloVe embeddings.

terms.meaning: Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers.
terms.example: Google ka pre-trained language model.

terms.meaning: Generative Pre-trained Transformer for text generation.
terms.example: ChatGPT, GPT-3 text generation models.

terms.meaning: Text mein emotions ya opinions detect karna.
terms.example: Movie reviews positive ya negative classify karna.

terms.meaning: Text mein persons, places, organizations identify karna.
terms.example: News article mein names aur locations extract karna.

terms.meaning: Words ko grammar categories assign karna.
terms.example: Noun, verb, adjective tags assign karna.

terms.meaning: Ek language se dusri language mein translate karna.
terms.example: English to Hindi automatic translation.

terms.meaning: Long text ka short summary banana.
terms.example: News article ka 2-3 lines summary.

terms.meaning: Text se questions ka answers automatically find karna.
terms.example: Wikipedia se questions ka answers extract karna.

terms.meaning: Human-like conversation kar sakne wala AI system.
terms.example: Customer service chatbots.

terms.meaning: Text generate karne ya next word predict karne wala model.
terms.example: GPT language model text complete karta hai.

terms.meaning: Model ko important words pe focus karne ki mechanism.
terms.example: Translation mein source words pe attention dena.

terms.meaning: Input sequence ko output sequence mein convert karna.
terms.example: English sentence ko Hindi sentence mein translate karna.

terms.meaning: Machine translation quality measure karne ka metric.
terms.example: Generated translation ko reference se compare karna.
